items.sentence: He was disappointed that things didn\'t turn out as he\'d hoped.
In the near future, space travel will no longer be just a dream.
Could you please show me a camera that\'s cheaper than this one?
It never occurred to me that someone would make up such a thing.
One hour of sleep before midnight is better than two afterwards.
One of the most urgent challenges of our time is climate change.
Last night, the temperature went down to ten degrees below zero.
My mother made me practice the piano every day when I was a kid.
I made Tom promise that he wouldn\'t tell anybody what happened.
It would be better for both of us not to see each other anymore.
Tom hopes to inherit a lot of money when his mother passes away.
Tom reinstalled the software that had accidentally been deleted.
Tom said he knew where Mary had hidden the money she had stolen.
Tom seems to turn into a different person when he speaks French.
Tom needed to be paid something, so I gave him everything I had.
Tom started asking questions as soon as he walked into the room.
Tom died of heart failure on October twentieth at the age of 93.
I could tell you things about Tom that you probably don\'t know.
I didn\'t know how to do it, but I was willing to give it a try.
I didn\'t know that Tom was the one who was supposed to do that.
I didn\'t know whether Tom would be permitted to do that or not.
Tom looked out the window at the ship that was coming into port.
Tom loved singing. However, no one wanted to listen to him sing.
It never occurred to me that Tom might not be telling the truth.
You don\'t actually think I\'m going to let you do that, do you?
Even though Tom is quite ugly, Mary still fell in love with him.
Everywhere you look you can see damage caused by the earthquake.
Tom certainly spends too much money buying things he never uses.
Tom checked his rearview mirror before pulling out into traffic.
Tom closed his eyes and leaned against the side of the elevator.
I know this isn\'t what you really wanted, but it\'s all I have.
Tom was tempted to go, but at the last moment he decided not to.
A student raised his hand when the teacher finished the reading.
All Tom wanted was for Mary to love him as much as he loved her.
As I entered the bar, I heard a sad song playing on the jukebox.
I\'d like to know why Tom didn\'t do what he was supposed to do.
Children depend on their parents for food, clothing and shelter.
Please mail this letter the next time you go to the post office.
Since Tom is a bartender, he uses an ice pick every day at work.
The ancient Greeks knew as much about the solar system as we do.
Tom blew his top when he heard that Mary had gone out with John.
Tom burned the roof of his mouth biting into the slice of pizza.
I tried to open the door, but I couldn\'t because it was locked.
I want the whole world to know that we\'re going to get married.
The kidnapper told me he\'d kill Tom if I didn\'t show up alone.
When Tom broke his leg, he had to use crutches for three months.
When Tom was eighteen, he decided he wanted to become a soldier.
I don\'t know how to play the flute, but I can play the trumpet.
I don\'t understand why Tom would leave his umbrella in the car.
Who do you think is the most interesting teacher at this school?
